name: sguard-project
description: SGuard - Discord Security Bot & Management Platform (Monorepo)

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:api && npm run install:bot && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:bot && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:bot" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:bot" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.clean: rimraf api/dist api/node_modules bot/dist bot/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:bot && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:bot && npm run lint:frontend

author: Daniel Flores
